titleStmt.title: A Iovrnall, or, A true and exact relation of each dayes passage, of that party of the right honourable the Earle of Manchesters army, vnder the command of the ever honoured Maior Generall Craford, from the first of August to the end of the same month. Wherein there is truly related the taking of severall places, with the conditions and articles of the same: purposely set forth for the honour of that party. Published by authority.

A Iovrnall, or, A true and exact relation of each dayes passage, of that party of the right honourable the Earle of Manchesters army, vnder the command of the ever honoured Maior Generall Craford, from the first of August to the end of the same month. Wherein there is truly related the taking of severall places, with the conditions and articles of the same: purposely set forth for the honour of that party. Published by authority.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
